did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: School of Hotel Administration Director's records, 1922-1981.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration. Director.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, files, albums, records, reports, meeting minutes, plaques.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records of the Director's Office and of Howard B. Meek include registration reports as well as school budgets, minutes of faculty and staff meetings, and reports.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Directors and deans represented include Howard B. Meek, Robert A. Beck, and John J. Clark.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of the Director's Office include correspondence files; biographical files; and subject files, including files of the Courtney Memorial Fund. Records of Howard B. Meek include registration reports, with letters to Meek; correspondence; items relating to a Hotel School European tour; and plaques and awards given to Meek. Also, school budgets, 1954-1978; minutes of faculty and staff meetings, 1935-1981; report of the Education Committee of the American Hotel Association, 1944; and minutes of Deans' Council meetings, 1968-1970.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: School of Hotel Administration Director's records, #28-1-1803. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
